name: Detonate (AdenMansonGames)
description:
A journey of a lost spaceman who travels through space, destroying planets of which hold threatening alien lifeforms. But what if that wasn't the truth? What if he was wiping out all current existence of the helpless alien creatures?

Play on Easy, Medium, Hard or the Extra level to try and beat all modes, can you be the superior race and fight for survival? Play right now and see!
